author: Osborne,Bruce
subject: Lupin Manga
body:
Well, I need someone's help, I just got in today at the Comic Shop my very
first taste of the Lupin manga, but I know for a fact its not the original
Monkey Punch version. Can someone tell me more about this one, author,
year, etc., Here is the cover I scanned:

http://www.thesoyokaze.net/lupin.jpg
--------------------------------------
Bruce Osborne
ICQ: 3 1 3 7 9 2 3 7 
Email: saitoh-hajime@neo.rr.com
URL: http://www.thesoyokaze.net
